page.title: 20RAILWAY AND ANCIENT FARM
page.content:
{RAILWAY:}The Southern Region London to Portsmouth line is an electric service but uses the third conductor rail system to supply electricity. Passenger trains are frequent in each direction, with special fast services to London for local commuters. {BUTSER HILL ANCIENT FARM PROJECT:}This project, started in 1972, aims to reconstruct and operate aspects of an iron age farm dating back to 300BC. It is being used to test theories based upon archeological evidence.
{COMPILED BY:}
{ 1ST PETERSFIELD SCOUT GROUP
{ (The Earl of Selborne's Own)
